entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
